claimReviewed: Did Anti-Woke Gamers Create A Conspiracy Theory to Attack Sweet Baby Inc?

itemReviewed.name: Did Anti-Woke Gamers Create A Conspiracy Theory to Attack Sweet Baby Inc?

reviewBody: Nathan Grayson ignores the actions Alyssa Mercante and Chris Kindred took in starting GamerGate 2 and labels the defensive actions gamers took to secure their privacy and property from Sweet Baby Inc's racist hate mob as a "Conspiracy Theory."
